basics.name: Gilang Gumilar
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I have more than two years of demonstrated experience working as a software engineer at two unicorn startup companies based in Indonesia. I consider myself to be a life-long learner. I like to code and solve algorithmic problems with it.

work.summary: Traveloka is an Indonesian unicorn company that provides airline ticketing, hotel booking services, and lifestyle products. I work as a full-stack engineer building Axes for Biz which is a public self-onboard platform of Traveloka Xperience products.
highlights: Maintain and implement UI forms. (ReactJS, Next.js)
Improve the landing page performance (Lighthouse audit) by 154%. (ReactJS, Chrome DevTools)
Design and implement database models and backend services. (PostgreSQL, Java)
Implement a CI/CD of the static web frontend. (AWS, Terraform, Next.js)

work.summary: Bukalapak is an Indonesian unicorn company and one of the leading online marketplaces in Indonesia. I worked as a part-time frontend engineer at Core Frontend team.
highlights: Implemented an internal dashboard of Core Trust and Safety team. (Vue.js, VueX, Vuetify, Express.js)
Implemented a Vue UI Component Library. (Vue.js, Storybook, Jest, SASS)

work.company: Computer Science Faculty of Universitas Indonesia

volunteer.summary: GitLab is an open source web-based DevOps lifecycle tool. I contribute to GitLab by fixing and implementing several features.
highlights: The second most MRs merged (57 MRs merged) of GitLab Hackathon Q2'2020. (Vue.js, Ruby on Rails)

volunteer.organization: Computer Science Faculty's Student Council of Universitas Indonesia
